revised_title: Chemical Analysis of the Cold Bokkeveld Meteorite
tldr: Michael Faraday analyzed the chemical composition of the Cold Bokkeveld meteorite. He found that the stone is soft, porous, and hygrometric, with a specific gravity of 2.94 and a small degree of irregularly dispersed magnetic power. The stone consists of 100 parts, with water being one of its main constituents.
